2025-08-04.content:
The following resource types are now publicly available through the [ExportAssets](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/reference/rest/v1/TopLevel/exportAssets), [ListAssets](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/listing-assets), [BatchGetAssetsHistory](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/reference/rest/v1/TopLevel/batchGetAssetsHistory), [QueryAssets](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/reference/rest/v1/TopLevel/queryAssets), [Feed](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/reference/rest/v1/feeds), and Search ([SearchAllResources](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/reference/rest/v1/TopLevel/searchAllResources), [SearchAllIamPolicies](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/reference/rest/v1/TopLevel/searchAllIamPolicies)) APIs.

* Contact Center AI Insights API
  + `contactcenterinsights.googleapis.com/EncryptionSpec`
* Network Security API
  + `networksecurity.googleapis.com/MirroringDeployment`
  + `networksecurity.googleapis.com/MirroringDeploymentGroup`
  + `networksecurity.googleapis.com/MirroringEndpointGroup`
  + `networksecurity.googleapis.com/MirroringEndpointGroupAssociation`

summary.title: Feature Announcement
summary.summary: New resource types available for Contact Center AI Insights and Network Security.

summary.title: New resource type available in Cloud Asset Inventory API
summary.summary: The Service Management API resource type is now available through Cloud Asset Inventory APIs, including ExportAssets, ListAssets, BatchGetAssetsHistory, QueryAssets, Feed, and Search.

The following resource types are now publicly available through the [ExportAssets](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/reference/rest/v1/TopLevel/exportAssets), [ListAssets](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/listing-assets), [BatchGetAssetsHistory](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/reference/rest/v1/TopLevel/batchGetAssetsHistory), [QueryAssets](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/reference/rest/v1/TopLevel/queryAssets), and [Feed](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/reference/rest/v1/feeds) APIs.

summary.title: Parameter Manager resources now publicly available
summary.summary: We are happy to announce that Parameter Manager resources are now publicly available through the Asset Inventory APIs, including ExportAssets, ListAssets, BatchGetAssetsHistory, QueryAssets, and Feed.

summary.title: Cloud Spanner support in Cloud Asset Inventory API
summary.summary: The Cloud Asset Inventory API now supports Cloud Spanner instance data, including instance partitions. This feature allows you to search and export Cloud Spanner resources through the Asset Inventory API.

2025-06-03.content:
The following resource types are now publicly available through the [ExportAssets](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/reference/rest/v1/TopLevel/exportAssets), [ListAssets](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/listing-assets), [BatchGetAssetsHistory](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/reference/rest/v1/TopLevel/batchGetAssetsHistory), [QueryAssets](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/reference/rest/v1/TopLevel/queryAssets), [Feed](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/reference/rest/v1/feeds), and Search ([SearchAllResources](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/reference/rest/v1/TopLevel/searchAllResources), [SearchAllIamPolicies](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/reference/rest/v1/TopLevel/searchAllIamPolicies)) APIs.

summary.title: New Asset Types Available
summary.summary: Asset types for Cloud Deploy and Dataproc Metastore, including Automation, AutomationRun, CustomTargetType, DeployPolicy, JobRun, and Federation, are now available through various Asset Inventory APIs like ExportAssets, ListAssets, BatchGetAssetsHistory, QueryAssets, Feed, and Search.
